title: Quic question: who are all the "super-mods" that run reddit? i know of awkward_the_turtle, but not anyone else

body:
Bardfinn is one. They are a notorious powermod, famous for their AHS spergouts. Not sure where El Goblino ranks on the powermod listings but they are probably one of the most infamous. 

I know Gallowboob is another. Merrari and Cyxie also come to mind.
body_html:
Bardfinn is one. They are a notorious powermod, famous for their AHS spergouts. Not sure where El Goblino ranks on the powermod listings but they are probably one of the most infamous.

I know Gallowboob is another. Merrari and Cyxie also come to mind.

post.title: Quic question: who are all the "super-mods" that run reddit? i know of awkward_the_turtle, but not anyone else

body:
https://www.wbur.org/endlessthread/2018/09/28/league-of-extraordinary-trolls

pHorniCaiTe, bilyup and N8theGr8 are a couple of that group. If you pay attention to the subs targeted in Masstagger and AHS you can catch their alts as well. TMOR booted Bard because they were being exposed and he was the weak link in that group of mods(due to some reactionary bullshit that he had pmed a user). It's a big group that runs an alt scam. Most of the top of r/all posts will be either their friends or alt accounts. It's all a fucking show. The user base of reddit is A LOT smaller than they want you to think.

post.title: Quic question: who are all the "super-mods" that run reddit? i know of awkward_the_turtle, but not anyone else

body: Short answer - Control. They want to control the online sentiment and drive it in the direction they want. Expose enough people to what you want them to think is the majority opinion while silencing the actual majority opinion allows you to sway the herd. They use extremes to paint enemies as "evil" and ignore any nuance. Using the alt army they can make whatever opinion they want seem like the norm. People will either comply or fight back. Both groups play a purpose. The people fighting back make the people who were previously unsure of which side of the fence they are on pick a side. Usually not the one painted as evil. They use caricature alts to create the evil if it is not organically present, and then show up with the reg accounts to win. So long answer is control as well.

post.title: Quic question: who are all the "super-mods" that run reddit? i know of awkward_the_turtle, but not anyone else

body: Yeah, basically any organization or person alive will try to sway things for their own benefit. Hypocritic as fuck but still part of the human condition. It's how statistically insignificant groups gain recognition and notoriety.
